Package com.ntu.scse

Class RoomMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ntu.scse.RoomMgr
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RoomMgr
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents the hotel's Room Manager that contains a list of all rooms and the methods for manipulating room facilities. One Room Manager contains an entire list of room
    Since:
    19/04/2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Cai LingZhi, Liu Fangbing, Christopher Lim, Eliza Wong
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RoomMgr​(java.util.ArrayList al)
      Create a new Room Manager with a list of rooms The constructor will check for existing list data

      java.util.List<Room> saveToFile​()
      Gives the master list back to main to write to file
      void ShowRoomMgrMenuOption​(GuestMgr gm)
      Display all the available Room option for client 1) View Room allow client to view all room, by status, or selected room 2) Update Room Details allow client to make changes to room 3) View Room Statistic Report allow client to view all statistic by room status or room type 4) Return to main, return client to main screen
      void updateRoom​()
      Options to update room 1) Room type allow client to change the room type 2) Room rate allow client to change the default room rate 3) Status allow client to change the current room status 4) Smoking/WIFI allow client to set whether room is allow for smoking/WIFI 5) Return to main
      void viewAllRoom​()
      Display all room and details

      View all Room by status "Vacant", "Occupied", "Reserved", "Under Maintenance"
      void viewAllVacantRoom​(int numGuest)
      Display all vacant room for reservation to select Based on the number of Guest, certain room will be displayed.
      void viewSelectedRoom​(GuestMgr gm)
      View selected room based on room no or guest name

    • Constructor Detail

      • RoomMgr

        public RoomMgr​(java.util.ArrayList al)
        Create a new Room Manager with a list of rooms The constructor will check for existing list data
        Parameters:
        al - The list received from Main. If there was previous data, use this, else, create an empty list.

      • ShowRoomMgrMenuOption

        public void ShowRoomMgrMenuOption​(GuestMgr gm)
        Display all the available Room option for client 1) View Room allow client to view all room, by status, or selected room 2) Update Room Details allow client to make changes to room 3) View Room Statistic Report allow client to view all statistic by room status or room type 4) Return to main, return client to main screen
        Parameters:
        gm - from Guest Manager class

      • updateRoom

        public void updateRoom​()
        Options to update room 1) Room type allow client to change the room type 2) Room rate allow client to change the default room rate 3) Status allow client to change the current room status 4) Smoking/WIFI allow client to set whether room is allow for smoking/WIFI 5) Return to main

      • RoomStatusStatistic

        public void RoomStatusStatistic​()
        Display Room Status Statistic by room type occupancy or by room status

      • viewAllRoomByStatus

        public void viewAllRoomByStatus​(int choice)
        View all Room by status "Vacant", "Occupied", "Reserved", "Under Maintenance"
        Parameters:
        choice - the option to view by selected room status

      • viewAllVacantRoom

        public void viewAllVacantRoom​(int numGuest)
        Display all vacant room for reservation to select Based on the number of Guest, certain room will be displayed.
        Parameters:
        numGuest - the total number of guest (adult+kids)

      • checkValidRoomForOrder

        public boolean checkValidRoomForOrder​(java.lang.String roomNo)
        Checks if a room is occupied. Used to validate room service ordering.
        Parameters:
        roomNo - The room number to check occupancy
        Returns:
        return true if the room is occupied, false if room is not occupied.

      • getRoomTypeFromNum

        public java.lang.String getRoomTypeFromNum​(java.lang.String roomNo)
        Gets the room type from the room number
        Parameters:
        roomNo - The room number to get the room type
        Returns:
        the room type of the room number specified

      • checkRoomEmpty

        public boolean checkRoomEmpty​(java.lang.String roomNo)
        Checks if a room is empty or not
        Parameters:
        roomNo - The room number to check if empty
        Returns:
        return true if room is vacant, else return false

      • assignRoom

        public void assignRoom​(java.lang.String roomNo,
                       int status,
                       java.lang.String name)
        Assigns a room to a desired status. Only applies to making room occupied and reserved.
        Parameters:
        roomNo - The room number to change room status
        status - The status to change the room to 1 = "Occupied", 2 = "Reserved"
        name - name of guest to assign to room

      • assignRoom

        public void assignRoom​(java.lang.String roomNo,
                       int status)
        Assigns a room to a desired status, only applies to making room vacant and under maintenance
        Parameters:
        roomNo - The room number to change room status
        status - The status to change the room to 0 = "Vacant", 3 = "Under Maintenance"

      • checkIn

        public void checkIn​(ReservationMgr resvMgr,
                    GuestMgr guestMgr,
                    BillMgr bm)
        The checkin process for the guest. Asks if guest is walk-in or has a prior reservation. If guest is walk-in, automatically set reservation check in date to today. Automatically creates a new bill when guest checks in. Assign room to occupied.
        Parameters:
        resvMgr - The reservation manager for reservation-related operations
        guestMgr - The guest manager for guest-related operations
        bm - The bill manager for bill-related operations

      • checkOut

        public void checkOut​(ReservationMgr resvMgr,
                     GuestMgr guestMgr,
                     BillMgr bm,
                     RoomService rs)
        The checkout process for the guest. Shows all checked-in reservations, and asks user to select which reservation to check out. Also asks for payment method by cash or credit. When user checks out, set associated room to vacant and remove all room service orders under that room. Prints out the final bill for that reservation, including any room service orders.
        Parameters:
        resvMgr - The reservation manager for reservation-related operations
        guestMgr - The guest manager for guest-related operations
        bm - The bill manager for bill-related operations
        rs - The room service manager for room service-related operations

      • saveToFile

        public java.util.List<Room> saveToFile​()
        Gives the master list back to main to write to file
        Returns:
        the master room list
